description: Unspecified vulnerability in the Oracle Customer Interaction History component in Oracle E-Business Suite 12.0.4, 12.0.5, 12.0.6, 12.1.1, 12.1.2, 12.1.3, 12.2.2, 12.2.3, and 12.2.4 allows remote attackers to affect confidentiality and integrity via unknown vectors related to List of Values.
